column2: X-axis rotation: Measures angular velocity along the x-axis.
Y-axis rotation: Measures angular velocity along the y-axis.
Z-axis rotation: Measures angular velocity along the z-axis.
Time: Timestamp when recordings were obtained.
Data recorded for wave gestures to identify peaks in motion.
Indoor setting during testing (Central Teaching Hub).
Device held in palm of hand while performing gestures.
Stored directly into SQLite database and then exported as a csv file.
